name: The Shadow Knight: Fighter 6/ Rogue 4/ Blackguard 10
author: Valerfor

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
I think it is time for the evil twin of the "Knight Templar" and although this is nothing extraordinary it gets the job done really well.

He has a very good skill set with Deadly traps, Taunt, and combat moves such as IKD to force his foes to submission & pass over his sneak attacks as well, UMD & Infernal powers to give him a further boost when he needs it. Those are on top of his Fighter training that has amassed from all those years of fighting. Ah, and for when he wants some extra help he summons a Vrock with his infernal powers. "Minion, attack!"

posts.author: fallander69
posts.content: Looks like great build for the Blackguard Trilogy, innit? :)

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
The build itself will do fine in the series. There are a couple of concerns though. You will not be able to finish act 1 before your character has at least 1 level of BG. Taking that at lvl 9 is borderline. At lvl 10 is definitely too late.
The 3rd act takes you character to early epic lvls, about 22. You should have a plan for that too.
